tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query:
select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"HH","1h") as "Start Time",
CONDITION(count(useraction.errorCount),  where starttime < $NOW and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("1d")) as "Today",
CONDITION(count(useraction.errorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("1d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("2d")) as "1 Day Before",
CONDITION(count(useraction.errorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("2d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("3d")) as "2 Days Before",
CONDITION(count(useraction.errorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("3d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("4d")) as "3 Days Before",
CONDITION(count(useraction.errorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("4d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("5d")) as "4 Days Before",
CONDITION(count(useraction.errorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("5d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("6d")) as "5 Days Before",
CONDITION(count(useraction.errorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("6d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("7d")) as "6 Days Before",
CONDITION(count(useraction.errorCount),  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("7d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("8d")) as "7 Days Before" 
FROM usersession where stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.errorCount) as "Today" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("1d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.errorCount) as "1 Day Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("1d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("2d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.errorCount) as "2 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("2d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("3d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.errorCount) as "3 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("3d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("4d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.errorCount) as "4 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("4d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("5d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.errorCount) as "5 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("5d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("6d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.errorCount) as "6 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("6d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("7d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(useraction.errorCount) as "7 Days Before" from usersession  where starttime < $NOW-DURATION("7d") and starttime > $NOW-DURATION("8d") and  stringProperties.airline="${uspClause.value}"
